summary: Battlemages rejoice! Retexture of Psiijic Robe so that appears to have armor plates underneath the robe. Also includes a chin guard head piece. This is clothing, it has no AR.
descriptionHtml:
This is a retexture of the Psiijic robes and hood that gives the appearance of steel plate beneath the robes. Unfortunately, since this is replacing the Psiijic robe, I cannot make it \"armor,\" so it actually behaves like clothing. 
Also added a jaw guard head piece/hood. Check out the screensdhots.

I plan to re-implement this as an unique armor when the Construction Set is released in January. I also plan to reskin the gloves and boots to match, but this is meant to be mixed and matched with heavy/light armors.

*******************************************
!!WHERE TO FIND THE ROBES!!
*******************************************
Kill a Psiijic mage (if that\'s possible). Or use the following console commands:

Hood:
player.additem 00065B99 1

Robes:
player.additem 00065B94 1

Gloves:
player.additem 00065B9D 1

Boots:
player.additem 00065B9B 1


Install
=======
1. Download.
2. Extract. Copy/Move the \"Data\" folder to your Skyrim directory. 
3. Overwrite existing file.
4. Launch Skyrim!

Uninstall
=========
1. Delete the \"psiijic\" folder located in your textures directory: Skyrim\\data\\textures\\clothes\\psiijic
2. Delete the \"psiijic\" folder located in your meshes directory: Skyrim\\data\\meshes\\clothes\\psiijic

Known Issues or Bugs
====================
Collar clips through hood at times.
Beards clip through jaw guard.
Jaw guard not set for beast races (Khajiit & Argonians).


Please report bugs to me at skyrimnexus.com or bethsoft.com forums.

Contact
=======
If you want to get a hold of me, I\'m at the bethsoft forums as SPARTAN VI.


Tools Used
==========
Photoshop CS4- http://www.adobe.com/products/photoshop/
Nifskope - http://niftools.sourceforge.net/wiki/NifSkope


Licensing/Legal
===============
Feel free to do whatever you like with this mod, but please give credit.
author: SPARTAN VI
